WorkItem.Description: Loaded my Prot Paladin into Rawr , Turned off Tier 12 in the Filter and a few other bits, then Clicked Leg Icon and the Top of the List was Magma Platted Legguards which is the DK Tank Tier 11 Piece.
WorkItem.Summary: [Item]Prot Paladin  - Show DK Teir 11 Legs as usable item

Comments.Message: I'm going to mark this as fixed since I do have this fixed in my local build and this will be closed once I can get the 371 Honor gear set up and pushed in the next release.

Seems that last cache update did not flag the DK class specific Justice point gear as being class specific. Most of the Magma stuff from JP shows up in both both DPS and Tank (Warrior and Pally) models.
Still not fixed, Magma items continue to show up for Pally toons. 4.2.3
